finalFeedback.textNeeded: Well done, you have completed this interaction.

question.p: What two things does Brendon want to know?

feedback.p: Bagaimana cara telepon / how to make a phone call. Bagaimana titip pesan / how to leave a message.

question.p: What suggestions are made for speaking to people who you do not know or who are older?

feedback.p: Pakai bahasa yang baku dan benar (Use formal and correct language)
Pakai sapaan Ibu/Bapak/Anda (Use the terms of address Ibu/Bapak/Anda)
Sikapnya harus sopan santun (your attitude/demeanour should be polite)
Pakai frasa 'boleh saya bicara dengan' atau 'tolong' (use phrases like 'may I' or 'please')

question.p: Why does Rizky say Brendon should use "Boleh saya bicara dengan" instead of "Saya mau berbicara dengan"?

feedback.p: Kedengaran agak tidak sopan kalau bilang 'Saya mau bicara dengan'. (It sounds rather impolite to say 'I want to talk to').

question.p: What does Vita say about talking to your friends?

feedback.p: Lain kalau ngomong sama teman, bisa pakai bahasa gaul, nggak apa2. (It's different if you are talking to your friends, you can use slang, no worries).

question.p: What politeness conventions are demonstrated in the phone conversation Vita and Rizky enact for Brendon?

feedback.p: Engages in small-talk first (Apa kabar? Kabar baik, bapak sendiri?)
She says 'bisa saya bicara dengan', not 'saya mau...'
